Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[00:16.67]Everybody gets high sometimes, you know
[00:22.04]What else can we do when we're feeling low?
[00:27.17]So take a deep breath and let it go
[00:32.14]You shouldn't be drowning on your own
[00:36.52]And if you feel you're sinking
[00:39.16]I will jump right over into cold, cold water for you
[00:47.03]And although time may take us into different places
[00:52.51]I will still be patient with you
[00:57.53]And I hope you know
[00:58.68]
[01:00.42]I won't let go I won't let go
[01:05.90]I'll be your lifeline tonight
[01:11.17]I won't let go I won't let go
[01:16.56]I'll be your lifeline tonight
[01:25.77]Cause we all get lost sometimes, you know?
[01:31.10]It's how we learn and how we grow
[01:36.37]And I wanna lay with you 'til I'm old
[01:39.31]I wanna lay with you 'til I'm old
[01:41.97]You shouldn't be fighting on your own
[01:44.51]
[01:45.85]And if you feel you're sinking
[01:48.55]I will jump right over into cold, cold water for you
[01:56.26]And although time may take us into different places
[02:02.23]I will still be patient with you
[02:06.81]And I hope you know
[02:08.51]
[02:09.90]I won't let go I won't let go 
[02:15.34]I'll be your lifeline tonight
[02:20.65]I won't let go I won't let go 
[02:25.97]I'll be your lifeline tonight
